FuncDef: This command specifies the receive timer used for BFD packets. If the template is used for a BFD session on an MPLS-TP LSP, then this timer is used for CC packets.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the receive interval. The minimum interval that can be configured is hardware dependent. Values-10 ms to 100,000 ms in 1 ms intervals. ParamDefault: Default- 10 ms for CPM3 or higher; 1 second for other hardware
